name: Tempest Breaker
description:
In Tempest Breaker you can control all 3 elements of a storm: wind, water and thunder.

Your mission is to kill as many enemies as you can.

You can kill the enemy if you have appropriate element that beats enemy's element:

Thunder beats Water

Water beats Wind

Wind beats Thunder

For instance, if you control thunder element you can defeat water enemy and gain points but if you step onto wind or thunder enemy you lose health.

You can move by using wsad keys or arrows.

You can also change current element by pressing space.

Remember about the time limit! Moving character refreshes the bar but once the bar reaches zero, you will stay still but the enemies will make their move.

Game made with Godot engine.

Game made for Mini Jam 26: Storms
